title: Carrie Bradshaw, Antichrist
author: VD
content_html:
Just in case you’re ever inclined to forget that Hollywood is openly and avowedly satanic. Once again, South Park knew. It’s inversive, but it’s not even cleverly insidious. I mean, how on Earth did they miss the opportunity to put Kim Cattrall in the role of Judas Iscariot?

DISCUSS ON SG
